entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
